sqlMap.insert:
/* pscpbrd0009.insertCallCenterPopupp */ INSERT INTO TOR_COUNSEL ( COUNSEL_SEQ , UP_COUNSEL_SEQ , LIST_SEQ , TITLE , CONTENT , MEMO
, SCRP_KIND_CD , WRTR_DIVN_CD , MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_NM , DEL_YN , ORDER_ID
, CLM_LGRP_CD , CLM_MGRP_CD , BOARD_PRGS_STS_CD , TEL_NO , CELL_NO , EMAIL
, SMS_DSP_YN , ANS_SMS_RECV_YN , WRT_DY , PBL_YN , EMAIL_SND_YN , ANS_EMAIL_RECV_YN
, QSTN_OBJECT_CD_STR_CD , ACCEPT_LOCA_CD , ACCEPT_ID , DICMF_DECLARE_YN
, REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID ) VALUES ( LPAD(SQ_COUNSEL_SEQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 12, 0) , LPAD(SQ_COUNSEL_SEQ_SEQ.CURRVAL, 12, 0) , LPAD(SQ_COUNSEL_SEQ_SEQ.CURRVAL, 12, 0)|| '~' , #title# , #content# , ''
, 'Q' , '02' , '' --customerID , '' --customerName , 'N' , #orderId#
, #typeBig# --counselMainCode , #typeSmall# --counselSubCode , '1' , '' , #cellNo# , #email#
, '' , #smsDspYn# , TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), 'YYYYMMDD') , 'Y' , 'Y' , 'Y'
, '981' --storeCode , '5' , (SELECT ADMIN_ID FROM TAD_ADMIN WHERE LOGIN_ID = 'scmagent') , 'Y'
, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) , #vendorId# , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) , #vendorId# )
